UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.OnStopped.Des: Broadcast when the sequence stops. Will send the instigator that started the sequence, if any.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.Visibility.De: Defines the context(s) in which this device will play back
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.DisablePlayer: Determines whether player movement/look input is disabled while the cinematic is active
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.ShowHUDDuring: Determines whether to show or hide HUD elements while the cinematic is active
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.bLevelSequenc: Flag specifying whether the device should always be relevant for networking. When disabled, this device's playback will only replicate to clients when it is relevant based on proximity
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.GoToEndAndSto: Go to End and Stop Function
Go to the end of this cinematic sequence and stop
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.FinishComplet:
If set to something other than none, when a sequence ends, the completion mode of any track sections still active will be overridden
by the chosen value, either keep state or restore state. Otherwise, completion mode will be determined by each track section.
Note that any track sections that finish before the end of a sequence will have their completion mode determined by the section settings rather than this override.
Initiate playback of this cinematic sequence
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.PlayReverseFu: Initiate playback of this cinematic sequence in reverse
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.PauseFunction: Pause playback of this cinematic sequence at its current time, if it is playing
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.TogglePauseFu: Pause the device if playing, play it if paused
Stop playback of this cinematic sequence, if it is playing. This will potentially restore its state, if the 'Restore State' option is enabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.Sequence.Desc: The Level Sequence asset that contains the cinematic content to play back
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.PlayRate.Desc: The rate at which to playback the cinematic
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.EnabledOnPhas: When Auto Play is enabled, this sequence is played on this phase
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.bLoopPlayback: When enabled, this cinematic device will loop continuously until stopped
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CinematicSequence_C.bAutoPlay.Des: When enabled, this device will automatically begin playing based on the the desired minigame state
